keyword: how many calories in a sausage and egg mcmuffin
title: How Many Calories in a Sausage and Egg McMuffin?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a sausage and egg mcmuffin, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and simple tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Sausage and Egg McMuffin?
assumptions: McDonald's-style Sausage McMuffin with Egg: English muffin, pork sausage patty, folded egg, American cheese; standard portion (~160 g).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, restaurant, recipe, portion size, and customizations; check official labels or apps for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A sausage and egg McMuffin has about 480 kcal, with 21 g protein and 31 g fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Use turkey sausage instead of pork

faqs.q: How many calories in a sausage and egg McMuffin?
faqs.a: Approximately 480 kcal for one standard serving.

faqs.q: What is the protein content in a sausage egg McMuffin?
faqs.a: About 21 g of protein per McMuffin.

faqs.q: Does a sausage and egg McMuffin have trans fats?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat, but check for restaurant-specific recipes.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in one sausage egg McMuffin?
Can I make a lower-calorie sausage and egg McMuffin at home?
faqs.a: Yes, by using lean sausage, whole-grain muffin, and skipping cheese to reduce calories by 100+.
